FitAll.short_help: Fits this view to the entire scene

SetLighting.short_help: Controls the type of lighting of objects
SetLighting.description:
Type should be one of:
	enable
	scene
	cam
	shadows
	smaterials
	skydome

IsLightingEnabled.short_help: Returns boolean state of lighting mode

EnableLighting.short_help: Enables or disables lighting of objects

GetShading.short_help: Returns the current object shading method
GetShading.description:
Returns one of:
	points
	wireframe
	wireframeonsurface
	flatshading
	smoothshading
	geometryonly
	geometryflat
	geometrysmooth

SetShading.description:
Method should be one of:
	points
	wireframe
	wireframeonsurface
	flatshading
	smoothshading
	geometryonly
	geometryflat
	geometrysmooth

GetLighting.short_help: Returns the current type of lighting of objects
GetLighting.description:
Type should be one of:
	enable
	scene
	cam
	shadows
	smaterials
	skydome

FitSelected.short_help: Fits this view to the selected object

CenterSelected.short_help: Centers this view on the selected object
